name: Alejandro Jodorowsky
description:
A mostly non-judgemental rank of various professions held by Alejandro Jodorowsky, the cult/surrealistic/mystical Chilean/French/Jewish filmmaker, presented without further comment:


Novelist
Playwright
Screenwriter
Film director
Theatre director
Essayist
Comics writer
Poet
Sculptor
Philosopher
Psychologist
Psychoanalyst
Painter
Storyteller
Film editor
Producer
Actor
Composer
Musician
Spiritual guru
Draughtsman
Costume designer
Puppeteer
Mime
Clown
